<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1050</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Birthdays Are Special</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geburtstage Sind Speziell</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Anniversaires Sont Spéciaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os Aniversários São Especiais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I Compleanni Sono Speciali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα γενέθλια είναι ειδικά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los Cumpleaños Son Especiales</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this activity learners are going to find what famous people were born on their birth date or the birth date of someone in their family. The learners will be asked to compare their personality traits, special abilities and interests, to find similarities or differences between their famous birthday partners and themselves.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">famous people</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">birthday</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">birth date</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Aktivität werden Anfänger finden, 
welche berühmte Leute an ihrem Geburt Tag oder am Geburt Datum von 
jemand in ihrer Familie getragen wurden. Die Anfänger werden 
gebeten, ihre Funktionseigenschaftmerkmale, spezielle Fähigkeiten und
Interessen, mit Entdeckungähnlichkeiten oder Unterschieden zwischen 
ihren berühmten Geburtstagpartnern und selbst zu vergleichen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette activité les étudiants vont trouver 
quelles personnes célèbres ont été soutenues leur date de 
naissance ou la date de naissance de quelqu'un dans leur famille. 
Les étudiants seront invités à comparer leurs traits de 
personnalité, capacités spéciales et intérêts, aux similitudes de
trouvaille ou aux différences entre leurs associés célèbres 
d'anniversaire et eux-mêmes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta atividade os learners estão indo encontrar 
que povos famosos foram carregados em sua data do nascimento ou na 
data do nascimento de alguém em sua família. Os learners 
serão pedidos para comparar seus traços da personalidade, abilidades
especiais e interesses, às similaridades do achado ou às diferenças
entre seus sócios famosos do aniversário e elas mesmas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa attività principianti stanno andando 
trovare che gente famosa è stata riguardata la loro data di nascita o
la data di nascita di qualcuno nella loro famiglia. I 
principianti saranno chiesti di confrontare le loro caratteristiche di
personalità, abilità speciali ed interessi, alle somiglianze del 
ritrovamento o alle differenze fra i loro soci famosi di compleanno ed
essi stessi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα οι αρχάριοι πρόκειται να 
βρούν ποιοι διάσημοι άνθρωποι γεννήθηκαν κατά την ημερομηνία 
γέννησής τους ή την ημερομηνία γέννησης κάποιου στην 
οικογένειά τους. Οι αρχάριοι θα κληθούν να συγκρίνουν τα 
γνωρίσματα προσωπικότητας, τις ειδικά δυνατότητες και τα 
ενδιαφέροντά τους, να βρούν τις ομοιότητες ή τις διαφορές 
μεταξύ των διάσημων συνεργατών γενεθλίων τους και τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta actividad los principiantes van a 
encontrar qué gente famosa nació su fecha del nacimiento o la fecha 
del nacimiento alguien en su familia. Pedirán los principiantes
comparar sus rasgos de la personalidad, capacidades especiales e 
intereses, a las semejanzas o a las diferencias entre sus socios 
famosos del cumpleaños y ellos mismos del hallazgo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">berühmte Leute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geburtstag</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geburt Datum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">personnes célèbres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">anniversaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">date de naissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">povos famosos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">aniversário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">data do nascimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gente famosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">compleanno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">data di nascita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάσημοι άνθρωποι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γενέθλια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ημερομηνία γέννησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gente famosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cumpleaños</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fecha del nacimiento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
